original_text: And they baked unleavened cakes of the dough that they had brought out of Egypt, for it was not leavened, because they were thrust out of Egypt and could not wait, nor had they prepared any provisions for themselves.
korean_text: 그들이 애굽으로부터 가지고 나온 발교되지 못한 반죽으로 무교병을 구웠으니 이는 그들이 애굽에서 쫓겨나므로 지체할 수 없었음이며 아무 양식도 준비하지 못하였음이었더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 누룩을 넣지 않은 빵을 구웠습니다

sentences.original_text: of the dough that they had brought out of Egypt
because they were thrust out of Egypt
nor had they prepared any provisions for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 자신들을 위해 양식을 준비하지도 못했습니다
